entries.title: Google launches new open-source security scanning tool
entries.description: OSV-Scanner provides access to Google database of vulnerabilities.

entries.title: Formula's new e-scooter substitutes race car speed for comfort and stability
entries.description: Made in collaboration with Zinc Sports, the GZ1's internal gyroscope keeps it steady over bumps and regulates speed.

entries.title: In the wake of ChatGPT, Google is worried it's behind the times
entries.description: Google employees and executives are at odds over whether AI will save or kill the company.

entries.title: Building a hardware fleet that will stand the test of time
entries.description: It’s more important than ever for small- and medium-sized businesses to ensure they specify computing equipment that remains useful for as long as possible

entries.title: FBI cyberthreat sharing portal has member data stolen
entries.description: Hacker posed as a real CEO to create an account in InfraGard and steal users' information.

entries.title: The essential tech supporting SMBs
entries.description: Dell’s Sarah Burkhart on identifying the right devices for your small or medium-sized business

entries.title: Silent Hill 2 remake developer is working on a new survival horror game
entries.description: Bloober Team has partnered up with the publisher behind The Outer Worlds for a brand new survival horror IP, but it won’t be out before 2025.

entries.title: Samsung is copying Apple's model to beat the iPhone 17 in 2025
entries.description: Samsung is rumored to have a team at the phone division designing new chips for flagship phones in 2025

entries.title: The case for consolidating your communications and IT support
entries.description: Combining your communications and IT support solutions can help your business meet these challenges head on.

entries.title: HDD storage costs could continue to plummet
entries.description: Backblaze believe HDDs will cost one cent per GB by 2025, and evidence suggests SSD prices are dropping too.

entries.title: Fortnite’s nod to Metallica is the latest in a vibrant history of gaming metal crossovers
entries.description: The new group emote in Fortnite is just one way that metal and video games have collided over the years.

entries.title: Legacy VPN will be replaced by ZTNA, sooner rather than later
entries.description: Interview: Perimeter81 tells us more about the future of VPN and the year ahead.

entries.title: The Rings of Power season 2's director line-up is pure magic
entries.description: Amazon has confirmed which directors will helm The Rings of Power's second season on Prime Video.

entries.title: Hardware drivers approved by Microsoft used in ransomware attacks
entries.description: Microsoft requires that it approves its drivers, but this needn’t mean that they’re any more secure.

entries.title: Offering other stores on Apple's iPhones and iPads isn't a surprise – it's a great move
entries.description: If reports prove true, this could be one of the biggest changes to the App Store in years, and it's not the end of the world for your iPhone.

entries.title: Nvidia RTX 4060 Ti GPU leak angers PC gamers
entries.description: Leaked specs for the graphics card look disappointing at first glance – but let’s not get carried away.

entries.title: Hogwarts Legacy's release date has delayed – but only on last-gen consoles
entries.description: Hogwarts Legacy has been delayed for PS4, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch.

entries.title: Oppo's hi-res audio chip could finally make wireless earbuds sound as good as wired
entries.description: The Chinese brand just showcased a ground-breaking chipset it claims is capable of lossless wireless audio.

entries.title: EU reveals its draft decision on replacement US data transfer deal
entries.description: A new adequacy decision is finally ready, after the previous one was struck down by the highest court in Europe over spying concerns.

entries.title: Give the gift of online security this Christmas with these quick changes
entries.description: Stay safe this festive season with our top tips.

entries.title: Most businesses hope cloud will be the catalyst to net zero
entries.description: Uncertain efforts, but perceptions of more significant changes. Could cloud be a solution to reaching net zero by 2050?

entries.title: Nvidia RTX 4070 Ti full GPU specs are spilled – and it’s good news
entries.description: Fresh leak on the RTX 4070 Ti banishes whispers about a hamstrung graphics card.

entries.title: Spatial audio and more coming to Pixel phones as part of exclusive Android beta
entries.description: Android 13 QPR2 Beta 1 also redesign launcher layouts and improves desktop mode.
